subject: Inquiry About Tax, Shipping, and Special Price for Pro Plus Pedals and Steering Wheel Set
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,


Good day!


I am very interested in purchasing the Pro Plus pedals and steering wheel
set from your store. Before placing my order, I would like to kindly ask
for the following information:


   1.

   Shipping cost to the Philippines
   2.

   Estimated delivery time
   3.

   Taxes or import duties I might need to pay upon delivery
   4.

   If itâ€™s possible to receive a special price or discount for the set


I would truly appreciate your support, as I am planning to use the setup
for a new sim racing project here in the Philippines.


Looking forward to your reply. Thank you in advance for your assistance!


Best regards,

Carlo Sampang

conversations.body_text: Hi John Carlo Sampang,     Here's the shipping schedule for shipping to the Philippines, with an estimated delivery time of 3-10 days. Regarding taxes, we are not sure if there will be any as we have so few orders from the Philippines. You can apply our special Member's Day discount for 12% off in this discount box.

How to apply the Member's Day discount? Do you have any discount/coupon
code? Because this is my first time buying in your store also.

On Thu, Jul 10, 2025 at 06:02 support@simsonn.com
Hi John Carlo Sampang,    You can type in this discount box in the picture: HF12
